channel.title: CVE Feed for The Jasper Project -- jasper
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Jasper Project -- jasper

item.title: CVE-2016-9583|2024-08-06T02:59:02.240Z -- the%20jasper%20project -- jasper
item.description: An out-of-bounds heap read vulnerability was found in the jpc_pi_nextpcrl() function of jasper before 2.0.6 when processing crafted input.

item.title: CVE-2016-8654|2024-08-06T02:27:41.212Z -- the%20jasper%20project -- jasper
item.description: A heap-buffer overflow vulnerability was found in QMFB code in JPC codec caused by buffer being allocated with too small size. jasper versions before 2.0.0 are affected.
